attributes.action: introduce legislation NOW to ensure that when any of the financial institutions who take advantage of the taxpayer funded guarantees to stay afloat issue bonuses to ANY member of their organisation it is to have the taxpayer funded guarantee immediately removed from them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxpayer pounds taken from people who must now decide whether to heat or eat MUST NOT be allowed to be paid out in bonuses.  The PM cannot legally stop the bonuses being paid but HE CAN (AND HE MUST) remove the taxpayer funded guarantee from any institution which pays bonuses regardless.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
